1.desc:
<color=#a2a2a2>This path we walk hand in hand and the footprints we leave side by side are our most precious memories.</color>

——Reach level 120 with the selected shipgirl.
1.name: Proficiency Level

2.desc:
<color=#a2a2a2>As long as you have mutual understanding, you can create a path to a brighter future.</color>

——Reach Enhancement Level 30 with the selected shipgirl.
2.name: Development Level

3.desc:
<color=#a2a2a2>A battle is a trial, a tempering of the self, and also the proof of your shared bond.</color>

——Sortie and obtain 200 victories with the selected shipgirl.
3.name: Combat Experience

4.desc:
<color=#a2a2a2>With this oath, may your many moments of beauty and bliss join together into an everlasting tale.</color>

——Oath the selected shipgirl.
4.name: Oathing

5.desc: Would you like to spend <color=#72bc42>$1 Gems</color> to produce a skin projection?
5.name: Additional Work 1

6.desc: Would you like to spend <color=#72bc42>$1 Gems</color> to produce a skin projection?
6.name: Additional Work 2
